verses.verse: Now Sarai <WH8297> Abram's <WH87> wife <WH802> bare <WH3205> him no <WH3808> children <WH3205> <WH8804>: and she had an handmaid <WH8198>, an Egyptian <WH4713>, whose name <WH8034> was Hagar <WH1904>.

And Sarai <WH8297> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Abram <WH87>, Behold now, the YY <WH3068> hath restrained me <WH6113> <WH8804> from bearing <WH3205> <WH8800>: I pray thee, go in <WH935> <WH8798> unto my maid <WH8198>; it may <WH194> be that I may obtain children <WH1129> <WH8735> by her. And Abram <WH87> hearkened <WH8085> <WH8799> to the voice <WH6963> of Sarai <WH8297>.

And Sarai <WH8297> Abram's <WH87> wife <WH802> took <WH3947> <WH8799> Hagar <WH1904> her maid <WH8198> the Egyptian <WH4713>, after <WH7093> Abram <WH87> had dwelt <WH3427> <WH8800> ten <WH6235> years <WH8141> in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> her to her husband <WH376> Abram <WH87> to be his wife <WH802>.

And he went in <WH935> <WH8799> unto Hagar <WH1904>, and she conceived <WH2029> <WH8799>: and when she saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that she had conceived <WH2029> <WH8804>, her mistress <WH1404> was despised <WH7043> <WH8799> in her eyes <WH5869>.

And Sarai <WH8297> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Abram <WH87>, My wrong <WH2555> be upon thee: I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> my maid <WH8198> into thy bosom <WH2436>; and when she saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that she had conceived <WH2029> <WH8804>, I was despised <WH7043> <WH8799> in her eyes <WH5869>: the YY <WH3068> judge <WH8199> <WH8799> between me and thee.

But Abram <WH87> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Sarai <WH8297>, Behold, thy maid <WH8198> is in thy hand <WH3027>; do <WH6213> <WH8798> to her as it pleaseht thee <WH2896> <WH5869>. And when Sarai <WH8297> dealt hardly with <WH6031> <WH8762> her, she fled <WH1272> <WH8799> from her face <WH6440>.

And the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> found her <WH4672> <WH8799> by a fountain <WH5869> of water <WH4325> in the wilderness <WH4057>, by the fountain <WH5869> in the way <WH1870> to Shur <WH7793>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Hagar <WH1904>, Sarai's <WH8297> maid <WH8198>, whence <WH335> camest thou <WH935> <WH8804>? and whither wilt thou go <WH3212> <WH8799>? And she said <WH559> <WH8799>, I flee <WH1272> <WH8802> from the face <WH6440> of my mistress <WH1404> Sarai <WH8297>.
And the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Return <WH7725> <WH8798> to thy mistress <WH1404>, and submit <WH6031> <WH8690> thyself under her hands <WH3027>.

And the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, I will multiply <WH7235> <WH8686> thy seed <WH2233> exceedingly <WH7235> <WH8687>, that it shall not be numbered <WH5608> <WH8735> for multitude <WH7230>.

And the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Behold <WH2009>, thou art with child <WH2030>, and shalt bear <WH3205> <WH8802> a son <WH1121>, and shalt call <WH7121> <WH8804> his name <WH8034> Yishma`el <WH3458>; because the YY <WH3068> hath heard <WH8085> <WH8804> thy affliction <WH6040>.

And he will be a wild <WH6501> man <WH120>; his hand <WH3027> will be against every man, and every man's hand <WH3027> against him; and he shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> in the presence <WH6440> of all his brethren <WH251>.

And she called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> that spake <WH1696> <WH8802> unto her, Thou 'Elohim <WH410> seest me <WH7210>: for she said <WH559> <WH8804>, Have I also here <WH1988> looked <WH7200> <WH8804> after him <WH310> that seeth me <WH7210> ?
Wherefore the well <WH875> was called <WH7121> <WH8804> Beerlahairoi <WH883> <WH2416>; behold, it is between Kadesh <WH6946> and Bered <WH1260>.

And Hagar <WH1904> bare <WH3205> <WH8799> Abram <WH87> a son <WH1121>: and Abram <WH87> called <WH7121> <WH8799> his son's <WH1121> name <WH8034>, which Hagar <WH1904> bare <WH3205> <WH8804>, Yishma`el <WH3458>.
And Abram <WH87> was fourscore <WH8084> <WH8141> and six <WH8337> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, when Hagar <WH1904> bare <WH3205> <WH8800> Yishma`el <WH3458> to Abram <WH87>.
